recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
In a separate pan, fry the pancetta with the garlic.
Beat the eggs in a bowl and mix in the cheese.
Drain the pasta and mix it with the pancetta, then remove from heat.
Quickly add the egg mixture and stir until creamy.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill the chicken breasts until fully cooked.
Chop the lettuce and place in a large bowl.
Slice the chicken and add it to the lettuce.
Top with parmesan, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
Toss the salad and serve.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat olive oil in a large pan or wok.
Add onions and stir-fry until translucent.
Add remaining vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil.
Serve with rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Banana Pancakes
instructions: Mash bananas in a bowl.
Whisk in eggs and add oats and cinnamon.
Heat a pan and add a small amount of oil.
Pour the batter into the pan, forming small pancakes.
Cook until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with maple syrup.

recipes.title: Tomato Basil Soup
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pot and sauté onions and garlic.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add vegetable broth and bring to a simmer.
Blend the soup until smooth.
Stir in fresh basil and season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook the ground beef in a pan until browned.
Add chopped onion and bell pepper, and cook until soft.
Stir in taco seasoning and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve the beef mixture in taco shells with cheese, lettuce, and tomato.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream together butter and sugars.
Beat in eggs and vanilla.
Beat in eggs and vanilla.
Mix in flour and baking soda.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place cheese between two slices of bread, buttered sides out.
Heat a pan and grill the sandwich until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Apple Pie
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix flour and butter until crumbly.
Add cold water to form a dough.
Roll out the dough and place it in a pie dish.
Peel and slice the apples.
Mix apples with sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Place the apple mixture in the dough and cover with another layer of dough.
Bake for 45-50 minutes or until golden brown.

recipes.title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan.
Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Squeeze lemon juice over the shrimp.
Season with salt, pepper, and parsley.
Serve hot.
